middleSection.content: This is the middle section content. Replace it with dynamic content as needed.

blog1.fullDescription: Stevenson Students have been named National Merit Scholarship Semifinalists. This honor recognizes students' academic excellence and outstanding performance.
blog1.shortDescription: GAPS students met the team that won National Women's Kabbadi
blog1.title: GAPS students win medals at International Karate Championship

blog2.fullDescription: Global Academy students showcased their coding prowess at the National AI Hackathon, securing top positions with their innovative machine learning projects.
blog2.shortDescription: Students shine at AI Hackathon with breakthrough projects.
blog2.title: GAPS students excel at National AI Hackathon

blog3.fullDescription: Global Academy launched its new Space Science Initiative, featuring guest lectures from ISRO scientists and hands-on projects on satellite modeling.
blog3.shortDescription: School kicks off ISRO-backed Space Science Initiative.
blog3.title: Global Academy introduces Space Science Program

blog4.fullDescription: GAPS students won multiple gold medals at the International Mathematics Olympiad, demonstrating their exceptional problem-solving skills and logical thinking.
blog4.shortDescription: Math geniuses at GAPS secure top ranks worldwide.
blog4.title: GAPS students triumph at International Math Olympiad

blog5.fullDescription: The school hosted an exclusive AI & Robotics Workshop, where students built and programmed their own autonomous bots under expert guidance.
blog5.shortDescription: AI & Robotics Workshop empowers students with future skills.
blog5.title: GAPS hosts AI & Robotics Workshop for students

blog6.fullDescription: Global Academy's science club developed a prototype for an AI-powered drone, which impressed judges at the National Innovation Fair.
blog6.shortDescription: Students showcase AI drone prototype at tech fair.
blog6.title: GAPS students develop AI-powered drone for Innovation Fair

blog7.fullDescription: GAPS hosted a career counseling session with ISRO scientists, guiding students on pathways to join India's leading space research organization.
blog7.shortDescription: ISRO experts inspire students on space career paths.
blog7.title: GAPS collaborates with ISRO for Career Guidance

blog8.fullDescription: Kayla Zisman has shown exemplary performance in her academics and extracurricular activities, making her a role model for all students at Stevenson.
blog8.shortDescription: Kayla's story is part of Stories of Stevenson, a series featuring students who inspire us every day.
blog8.title: GAPS works towards reducing academics pressure on students

notices.description: The next Parent-Teacher Meeting will be held on December 20, 2024, at 10:00 AM in the school auditorium.
notices.title: Parent-Teacher Meeting Scheduled

notices.description: The school will remain closed from December 25, 2024, to January 1, 2025, for winter break. Classes will resume on January 2, 2025.
notices.title: Winter Break Notice

notices.description: The Annual Sports Day will be held on January 15, 2025. Parents are welcome to attend the event.
notices.title: Annual Sports Day Announcement

testimonial1.name: Vikas Gupta

testimonial2.feedback: Helping organize the fundraiser was fulfilling. Can't wait for the next one!
testimonial2.name: Rishabh Jangid
